Scilab function

NAME

    scigraph - opens a scilab graphics window with graph menus enabled

CALLING SEQUENCE

scigraph(graph=g,window=[win],wdim=[w,h],wpdim=[w1,h1],gmode="rep" or "new")

PARAMETERS

    • graph=g : g is a string which give the path of the graph file to be displayed.
    • window=win : win gives the graphics window number to use.
    • wdim=[w,h] : graphics window internal dimensions (just as in xset("wdim",w,h) ), default is [700,700] .
    • wpdim=[w1,h1] : graphics window external dimensions (just as in xset("wpdim",w1,h1) ), default is [700,700] .
    • gmode= : optional string argument. Only useful when the parameter window is not supplied. "rep" means that the current graphics window must be used and its content is to be replaced by the new graph. "new" means that a new graphics window is to be opened.

DESCRIPTION

    This function is used to open a scilab graphics window with graph menus enabled. If a graph is supplied, the graph is displayed in the new window.

EXAMPLES

    gname= SCI+"/demos/metanet/mesh100.graph";
scigraph(window=2,graph=gname,wdim=[500,500],wpdim=[300,300]);
scigraph(window=3,graph=gname,wdim=[1000,1000],wpdim=[400,400]);

SEE ALSO

    show_arcs show_nodes show_graph xset
